  • Field Details

    • BASE_URL

      public static String BASE_URL
      The location of the Social Magnet Web Service.

      This value is injected when the application starts, or left at the default value.

      A REST client that handles requests to and responses from the web service.

  • Method Details

    • getJSONInvocationOfTarget

      protected javax.ws.rs.client.Invocation.Builder getJSONInvocationOfTarget​(String... urlParts)
      A convenience method to get a builder for an invocation of some web resource located in a subdirectory of the web service, in JSON format.

      It is very common to simply access some web resource, and this method allows us to minimise repeating the same procedures.

      Parameters:
      urlParts - An array of the URL components of a given resource. Given a resource at the location http://.../magnet/user/adam/friends, this method would simply be invoked with urlParts = {"user", "adam", "friends"}.
      Returns:
      A builder for an invocation to a web resource, in JSON format.

    • getTextInvocationOfTarget

      protected javax.ws.rs.client.Invocation.Builder getTextInvocationOfTarget​(String... urlParts)
      A convenience method to get a builder for an invocation of some web resource located in a subdirectory of the web service, in plain text format.

      It is very common to simply access some web resource, and this method allows us to minimise repeating the same procedures.

      Parameters:
      urlParts - An array of the URL components of a given resource. Given a resource at the location http://.../magnet/user/adam/friends, this method would simply be invoked with urlParts = {"user", "adam", "friends"}.
      Returns:
      A builder for an invocation to a web resource, in plain text format.

    • getTarget

      protected javax.ws.rs.client.WebTarget getTarget​(String... urlParts)
      Create a target that references a web resource at a given subdirectory.
      Parameters:
      urlParts - An array of the URL components of a given resource. Given a resource at the location http://.../magnet/user/adam/friends, this method would simply be invoked with urlParts = {"user", "adam", "friends"}.
      Returns:
      A target that references a web resource at the given subdirectory.
